features.html:
Sed si tantus amor casus cognoscere nostros, 

incipiam.

choicesHtml: But if there is such a great desire to understand our misfortunes, I will begin.
But if it is your desire to understand such a great misfortune, I will begin.
But if we understand the reasons of such a great desire, I will begin.
But if our desire understands such great reasons, I will begin.
